name: Santa in 2021
description:
Santa in 2021

Have you ever wondered how would Santa hand the presents at Christmas during these tough times? well in this game you will be able to play as Santa and your task will be to avoid the virus to reach the houses of every kid. There will be 10 challenging levels where in order to pass to the next stage you will have to collect every present box on the map. You can control Santa using w, a, s, d or the directional keys to avoid the obstacle and reach the goal.

This game is better visualized with a full screen on a 16:9 screen, to toggle the full screen there is a blue box at the bottom right corner of the game.
